name: Sniper Block Dudu
description:
Sniper is the main content of this game, user will shoot all the targets in each scenes. 
User will become a sniper assassin.
Beside that, the Character in game are so funny.
All game are block such as : gun, character, house , car, street..
Sniper block dudu will update commonly map.It will give user more exciting.
Dudu try to get more feed back from all of users and improve.
